channel.title: Battery indicator?
channel.description: Does Whonix come with one? I tried looking for it but I couldn't find anything. The reason is that I make Whonix full screen and its kind of annoying to always have to exit full screen to see battery levels. If not, is this done for security reasons?

item.title: Battery indicator?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
As a VM with emulated hardware there is no way to know about the battery levels of baremetal by design

Read full topic
